name: TrifoHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on Max”
”Alexa, turn off Max”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
To use this skill, click "ENABLE TO USE" above and sign in with your Trifo Home account to link your robot. You must create a Trifo Home account and register your robot in the Trifo Home app.
Simply ask Alexa to turn on or turn off your connected robot vaccum by saying:
1. Alexa, turn on Max
2. Alexa, turn off Max
Max is sample custom robot names. If you've named your robot vacuum, you can use its name to control it through Alexa.
